meanings.definition: A person who follows a routine or set of established procedures.
meanings.sent1: The routinist always does things in the same order every day.
meanings.sent2: The office routinist starts work at exactly 9 a.m. every morning.
meanings.sent3: The routinist's idea of excitement is organizing their sock drawer.
meanings.sent4: She was a routinist, her life a carefully choreographed dance of habits.
meanings.sent5: The routinist's world is a series of well-worn paths, never straying from the familiar route.

meanings.definition: Someone who adheres strictly to a specific routine or schedule.
meanings.sent1: As a routinist, he never missed his daily jog around the park.
meanings.sent2: The strict routinist always eats lunch at exactly 12:30 p.m.
meanings.sent3: The routinist's alarm clock is their best friend, always keeping them on track.
meanings.sent4: She was a routinist, her life a symphony of repetitive notes.
meanings.sent5: The routinist's schedule was as unchanging as the rising sun, a constant in a world of variables.
